= Authenticate service account
:slug: authenticating-your-service-account

== Prerequisite

xref:creating-a-service-account-to-manage-your-database.adoc[Create a Service Account to manage your organization].

== Procedure

. Pass the `clientName`, `clientId`, and `clientSecret` from your service account secret through the DevOps API.
+
[source, shell, subs="attributes+"]
----
curl --request POST \
  --url https://api.astra.datastax.com/v2/authenticateServiceAccount \
  --header 'accept: application/json' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"clientName":"user@domain.com","clientId":"58391caa-5c48-4e28-8b70-da3fe1624f3c","clientSecret":"42d9e2h3-4d25-40k8-aa1a-c9f6cc73ef10"}'
----

The link:_attachments/devopsv2.html[DevOps API] returns your authentication token, which is required for additional operations via the API:

[source, plaintext]
----
qyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsInR5cCIgOiAiSldUIiwia2lkIiA6ICJsYmJUcDRObzdfUHBJLUxOWFZJbUFmY1pWQWs3TFNwdnY5Z0RFVF80M2ZrIn0..uif6hxHIDWh475rmQiCVr2MPfrRpg7JA272tnxLl7y0bBgngFdgJMZZRlB3oMZNgixSJutSc_7c8y-PDJ0DDJg3mXFMkFMgWzoXXpFXIp1zitdhlZ-SHMu2s6I1C2DJOCit6wPz8ZwrV8k4wGkfiqgwTyRBMQpK6Keaf7jkB7Uxi9M8vkJE2kE_vzuW-vmTZ4HeMZNAKxestccYUKH7WF1LZQNsYkl9vizxGlW6BORrBz_AmLxS8unZMDYNJFh8BAuCRRS9KOkyi6D4jZQRwX1xpN5erbiXmPR1JPM4pxAefuMlsbzlSF4R8sqkK0p_xzji5jSvGbjNqXckJmiSQeg
----
[arabic, start=2]
. Copy the authentication token, which is required to run additional commands in the DevOps API.
